sentences.sContent: Mrs. Hardie refrained from making any comment.
sentences.sCn: 哈迪太太忍住了没做任何评论。

remMethod.val: re(回， 向后) + frain(笼头) → 笼头往后 → 抑制， 克制

trans.tranOther: to not do something that you want to do

trans.tranCn: 反复句， 叠句； 副歌； 经常重复的评价
trans.tranOther: part of a song or poem that is repeated, especially at the end of each  verse
